page.title: Students

blocks.content:
Find materials for courses and workshops on [https://hydro-informatics.github.io](https://hydro-informatics.github.io/ "https://hydro-informatics.github.io/").

Why am I using the word _courses_ in lieu of _classes_?

This terminology aims at not confusing students of my _Python_ _courses_, where _classes_ are essential elements in object orientation.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Find materials for courses and workshops on https://hydro-informatics.github.io.

Why am I using the word courses in lieu of classes?

This terminology aims at not confusing students of my Python courses, where classes are essential elements in object orientation.
